hero.title: Installation Guide
hero.subtitle: Install CeroCloud on your computer in a few minutes. Compatible with Windows, macOS, and Linux.

step2.title: Run the File
step2.text: Double click the downloaded file. You may see a "Windows protected your PC" (SmartScreen) warning.

warning.title: Why does this appear?
warning.text: As we are a free open source project, we don't pay for the expensive Microsoft certification. Click "More info" and then "Run anyway". It's 100% safe.

step3.title: Automatic Installation
step3.text: The installer will screw everything automatically. Upon finishing, CeroCloud will open alone and create a shortcut on your desktop.

updates.title: Automatic Updates
updates.text: CeroCloud will check for new versions automatically every time you open it. If there is an update, it will download in the background and install next time you restart the app.
updates.badge: You will always be up to date effortlessly.

hero.title: User Manual
hero.subtitle: Learn to master CeroCloud. From your first sale to advanced inventory management.

setup.title: 1. First Start
setup.description: When opening CeroCloud for the first time, we will guide you through a quick setup wizard. Here you will define your business identity.

step1.title: Business Data
step1.text: Name, address, and contact. These will appear on your tickets.

step2.title: Currency and Taxes
step2.text: Define your local currency (e.g., USD, MXN) and default VAT.

step3.title: Logo
step3.text: Upload your logo to customize the application.

inventory.title: 2. Inventory Management
inventory.subtitle: The heart of your business. Keep your product catalog organized.

add_product.title: Add Product
add_product.description: Click "New Product". You must fill in:

low_stock.title: Low Stock Control
low_stock.description: Define a "Minimum Stock". When a product falls below that amount, CeroCloud will mark it in red and send you an alert on the Dashboard to restock.

step1.label: Search
step1.text: Scan a barcode or type the product name in the search bar.

step2.label: Add
step2.text: The product is added to the cart. You can adjust quantity with [+] and [-] buttons.

step3.label: Checkout
step3.text: Press "Complete Sale". Choose payment method (Cash, Card, Mixed).

step4.label: Ticket
step4.text: If you entered a cash amount, it will tell you the change. You can print the ticket or email it.

reports.title: 4. Reports and Analysis
reports.subtitle: Make data-driven decisions. CeroCloud generates automatic reports of your operation.

cutoff.title: Cash Cutoff
cutoff.desc: Daily summary of sales, cash in hand, and payment methods.

top_products.title: Top Products
top_products.desc: Discover what sells most and what products are stagnant.

history.title: Sales History
history.desc: Detailed list of all transactions. Allows cancellations and reprints.

inventory_value.title: Inventory Value
inventory_value.desc: Calculate how much money you currently have invested in merchandise.

profits.title: Profits
profits.desc: Difference between costs and sales (Profit margin).

export.title: Export All
export.desc: Download any report to Excel (CSV) or PDF with one click.
